name: J-B Weld WaterWeld Epoxy Stick - Moisture Resistant, Indoor/Outdoor
description: The J-B Weld Co. 2 oz. WaterWeld Epoxy Stick helps make repairs in moist applications and underwater applications. This epoxy adheres to a variety of surfaces including fiberglass, PVC plastic, copper, iron and aluminum.Helps to make repairs in moist applications and underwater applicationsAdheres to a variety of surfaces including fiberglass, PVC plastic, copper, iron and aluminumCan be drilled, sanded, filed, tapped, machined and paintedFor general-purpose repairsCures in 60 minutes
